channel.title: How to change the exp everything gives?
channel.description: Like attacking, instead of normal slow runescape, faster and quicker exp, from maging, ranging, anything really.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 05:45:38 PM[/size][hr]omg

item.title: How to change the exp everything gives?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“kongmeng93, post:2, topic:160060”]1)open client.java from your source(not client)

2)search for “exprate”

3)change the exprate to whatever you want…

for example…

TotalExp = (double)(10000*hitDiff)

this is mine…=)

this means u get 10k exp per hit[/quote]

Dont gravedig.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the exp everything gives?

item.title: How to change the exp everything gives?
item.dc:creator: @kongmeng93 kongmeng93
item.description:
@kongmeng93 wrote:

1)open client.java from your source(not client)

2)search for “exprate”

3)change the exprate to whatever you want…

for example…

TotalExp = (double)(10000*hitDiff)

this is mine…=)

this means u get 10k exp per hit
